content: After one year of taking orders from pin heads in Civil Service that were so stupid my wife would often come home and throw crap at me for laughing, she finally took my advice and got the promotion she was looking for. Project Manager. I simply told her to hang out with the people who take smoke breaks every 20 minutes, think they know their jobs, and tell them all you love Obama. Sure enough it worked.

content: CONGRATS to your wife. I remember when I was working, I quit smoking and I never bothered anyone when they took a smoke break. I stayed at my desk and worked my rear off. I now smoke again, lol., retired now.
